com.gieseckedevrient.smartcard
Class Reader

java.lang.Object
  com.gieseckedevrient.smartcard.Reader

public class Reader
extends java.lang.Object

This class is a proxy class that represents a certain Secure Element Reader which is available within the phone system.
This proxy class allows the establishment of a communication session to a Secure Element reachable by this represented Reader for an APDU transfer and provides methods for checking the Secure Element properties.

Method Summary

          Closes all Sessions established by these Reader

          Returns the Service that provides this Reader.

Method Detail

getName

public java.lang.String getName()
The name of this Reader

Returns:
name of this Reader

openSession

public Session openSession()
Returns a Session object that can be used for the APDU transfer with a Secure Element provided by this Reader.

This method prepares (initializes) the Secure Element for communication before the Session object is returned (e.g. powers the Secure Element by ICC ON).


Consider: This method returns always a new Session to the Secure Element connected to this Reader. In this way several communication Sessions can be established to a single Secure Element independently from each other.

Returns:
a Session object that can be used for communication.
Throws:
java.lang.IllegalStateException - if an internal error occurs.
java.io.IOException - if a Secure Element is not present.

isSecureElementPresent

public boolean isSecureElementPresent()
Returns true if this Secure Element is present in this Reader

Returns:
true if a Secure Element is present false if a Secure Element is absent

getSeService

public SEService getSeService()
Returns the Service that provides this Reader.

Returns:
the Service that provides this Reader.

closeSessions

public void closeSessions()
Closes all Sessions established by these Reader
